Title does not state it is uncut, only that it is an unrated cut of the original movie.  I do not mind the .mkv at all, VLiS- actually like how clean it is- but have no problem, either, simply converting the file to .avi or mp4 or whatever format is required if the files are to be played on a different player.  I'm just grateful you went through the time and trouble to post the torrent in the first place- THANK YOU!

"Unrated Cut" or "Uncut" are the same thing.
The source of this rip was a PAL DVD, so the difference in the duration is because of the "framerate".
This version of 120min @ 25fps equals to a NTSC version of 126min @ 23.976fps.
